title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Meta prevails in historic FTC antitrust case, won’t have to break up WhatsApp, Instagram
items.description: U.S. District Judge James Boasberg issued his ruling Tuesday after the historic antitrust trial wrapped up in late May.

items.title: House votes 427-1 to release Epstein files in remarkable rebuke to Trump
items.description: Both President Trump and Speaker Mike Johnson failed in their efforts to prevent the vote

items.title: Exclusive: Crypto exchange Kraken raises $200 million from Ken Griffin’s Citadel Securities to notch $20 billion valuation
items.description: Once skittish about digital assets, Citadel has warmed towards the crypto business in 2025.

items.title: U.S. stocks follow Asia, Europe down on fear that Nvidia, other superstars are overvalued
items.description: After quickly sliding to a morning loss of 1.5%, the S&P 500 clawed back nearly all of it before sinking again. It finished with a fall of 0.8%.

items.title: ‘Bond King’ Jeffrey Gundlach warns of the next financial crisis: ‘It has the same trappings as subprime mortgage repackaging in 2006’
items.description: The billionaire founder of DoubleLine Capital is also convinced the $38 trillion national debt will be addressed before 2030: "something has to happen...
